title: Sunday Comics: Eating Oatmeal
text:
Hello! It’s time for Kotaku’s Sunday Comics, your weekly roundup of the best webcomics.

Corpse Run by Alex Di Stasi. Published Oct. 10. Read more of Corpse Run.

Clueless Hero by Luis Lee and Ana Gaby Perez. Published Oct. 7. Read more of Clueless Hero.

Double XP by M.S. Corley and Josh Crandall. Published Oct. 9. Read more of Double XP.

Life in Aggro by Fei Hsiao and Cecilia Vasquez. Published Oct. 12. Read more of Life in Aggro.

Nerf NOW!! by Josué Pereira. Published Oct. 13. Read more of Nerf NOW!!

Penny Arcade by Jerry Holkins and Mike Krahulik. Published Oct. 11. Read more of Penny Arcade.

Awkward Zombie by Katie Tiedrich. Published Oct. 5. Read more of Awkward Zombie.
description: Hello! It’s time for Kotaku’s Sunday Comics, your weekly roundup of the best webcomics.
